data.title: Pua, Nan, Thailand
data.text:
Pua, also known as Paw or ปัว, is a district in Nan province, Thailand. Located in the northern part of the country, it is known for its stunning natural beauty, including lush forests, cascading waterfalls, and scenic mountain views. The weather in Pua is characterized by a tropical monsoon climate, with warm temperatures and abundant rainfall throughout the year. The district has a rich history and heritage, with evidence of human settlement dating back to the Neolithic period.
